Detailed Description

This is an interface for generic event data. IAVGPlayer::getCurEvent() returns a pointer to the currently active event, if there is one. Depending on the type of the event, it will hold additional data described in IAVGMouseEvent, IAVGKeyEvent or IAVGWindowEvent.

Member Data Documentation

readonly attribute long IAVGEvent::type
 

One of the constants KEY_UP, KEY_DOWN, MOUSE_MOTION, MOUSE_BUTTON_UP, MOUSE_BUTTON_DOWN, MOUSE_OVER, MOUSE_OUT, RESIZE or QUIT.

readonly attribute long IAVGEvent::when
 

Returns the time (in milliseconds since 1970) at which the event happened.
